state_machine

Enum Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Action>
      • state_machine.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Action>

    public enum Action
extends java.lang.Enum<Action>
    Defines possible actions that trigger state transitions
